title: Stolen last night - Orange Split Screen Van

posts.content:
A friend of mine had is Orange Split Screen Van stolen last night 17/03/2012 from Crystal Palace. if anyone sees it please can they contact me (Richard) on 07786060828, alternatively call the Police who are aware it is stolen.

It is a rare model in that it has doors either side in the middle of the van, also it's right hand drive.



Cheers Jeff
Thanks Jeff, my online skillls are spectacularly bad however I have just managed to upload a couple of photos on the SSVC Facebook page!
